description: AppSettings — Contains environment and run-time configuration used by the tests: - browser, various test site URLs, implicit wait, and env. - Loaded by `BaseTest` via Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.

locators.xml: locators.xml — Stores page->element->selector mappings. - Structure: <locators><PageName><ElementName>selector</ElementName>...</PageName>...</locators> - Read by XMLLocatorReader.GetLocatorValue(pageName, elementName).
